name: Omnicalculator
description: A complex React application with multiple calculators to help you make basic calculations, track finances, and much more!

name: Party Planner
description: An ultimate party planner that centralizes every step of the party planning process in one application.

name: The Daily Meow
description: A simple calendar application to bring a little cat inspired joy to your everyday scheduling.

name: Note Taker
description: A basic note taking app that saves notes for a user.

name: Workday Scheduler
description: A daily calendar application that allows the user to schedule events on an hourly basis.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A dashboard that displays a daily and five-day forecast for a given city.

name: Coding Quiz
description: A quiz application that allows the user to test their basic coding knowledge.

name: Password Generator
description: A quick and easy way to generate a password within the selected parameters.
